content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette when a stationary craft (too far away to identify)in the south sky in the area of hudson, wisconsin launched two small, triangular craft.  each craft had a light on each corner.  they moved very rapidly from south to east...Would hover...Then move rapidly back and forth in mostly the eastern and southern sky.  event lasted over 1 1/2 hrs. to 2 hrs.  they were over 2000 ft. up but hard to tell how large the craft were due to distance but appeared to be approx. 50-100 ft across or more.  very rapid, smooth movement was the distinguishing characteristic.  i tried to track them with binoculars but they moved too fast and i'm a trained navy look-out and couldn't track them due to their speed.  cloud cover limited constant observation but they would go in and out of clouds, hover, and glide rapidly back and forth.  finally there was only one and it seemed to spend most of it's time in what is my eastern sky.  i feel like i've just witnessed something that was certainly not an aircraft.  planes cannot move like that.  i could only see one light as they moved but when they hovered, i could see a light on each corner of a triangular craft.  as they hovered, they would turn as though they had a forward position.  this is the first time i've seen anything like this and felt astounded at what i was witnessing.  i wanted to get someone else to observe what i was seeing but felt intimidated to do so.  people think you're a nut case if you do.  i know what i saw and was actually excited at what i was seeing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two craft, triangular shape with light on each corner, extreme rapid movement from so. to east, then hover.  seemed to be launched from stationary craft in south sky

content.detailedDescription:
1. i work second shift near jenkinsville south carolina.

2. these are the same objects i first noticed when i lived in haines city florida, the first one in this area i noticed 4 or 5 months ago south of columbia.

3. i have no idea, it is a stationary object, but does will move to different location after a few weeks, very much like the ones i saw in florida.

4. it is a stationary object with very bright strobe lights.

5. no feelings, my guess it is some type surveillance activity by our crooked government.

6. the objects are visible all night long, for weeks at a time.  other people i work with think they are communication satellites, i know better then that.
content.summary: Flashing strobe lights

content.detailedDescription: I was on the football field at shawnee mission norths stadium with about 17 other kids hanging out. we were playing a band game called "lap tag" nothing strange observed. i hear someone say, "look satellites" after looking at them and everyone else no longer caring about it, i thought it was just birds, but how unusual they were flying, because no wings were flapping at all. the formation was sort of how you would see birds in a form, however after heading south closer to the football fields direction, the formation abruptly formed to the east and headed off until i couldn't see a trace of it. no noise was heard and no light emission from where i was located. i tried to find it after losing track of it but it had been completely gone. i was in shock to say the least, i asked my friend d if he saw it and he didn't seem too phased but agreed that he had seen it.
content.summary: Thought it was birds at first, no way was it birds, the objects were in a formation that suddenly changed direction and form but uniformly.

content.detailedDescription:
Date oct 24, 2016 estimated 9:30am central us time.
observer location: balcony (8th floor-pool level) at hotel habita in the city of monterrey, nuevo leon, mexico
observer location coordinates: latitude:25.6512 / longitude:-100.3677
observer activity at the time of sighting: sight-seeing (visiting family)
sighting date/time: 10/24/2016 – approx. 9:30 am
day conditions: partly cloudy sky; sun shining from the east. 

incident description: looking due north from observer location at a distance estimated to be 15 to 20 miles.
i first believed to see two white balloons aimlessly drifting upward rising from the area of a mountain in the distance. after carefully viewing the ascent of said objects, i realized the rate of ascent was too fast to be balloons, and the direction was too straight upward to be in fact balloons. the sighting was followed for about 1 to 2 minutes until both objects were lost into the cloud cover. 
my friends viewed a third identical object, but i did not see it. they mentioned the three objects were in a triangular formation. i was not able to evidence this formation.
not knowing what i saw has made me want to write this submission.
content.summary: Unknown objects ascending into cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Very strange light or orb orbiting around a second orb, though the second one was blinking. the orbiting light appeared so close to the other but was erratic, it appeared to be almost "lassoing"the other. silent. appeared the glide across sky but went slow enough to observe this oddity. i often see air planes in  the same air space, since i left be somewhat near to airport here in knoxville,tn but this was no air craft. looked like one light
content.summary: Orbiting orb

content.detailedDescription: Just moved into a new place, went out for a cigarette, and seen a strange series of lights. blue green red and white. random pulses. had my roommate come out to verify. and so him and his girlfriend came out and seen it as well. the ufo had no set flight path. flying side to side up and down and stationary. the lights look like blinking to the naked eye but with binoculars you can see the lights like a rainbow go across it with no set pattern. the object i did not see land but then seen multiple through the night until morning. i observed the next  night the same thing.
content.summary: Two days active same time

content.detailedDescription: 5177490344 the glowing sphere-like object appeared out of nowhere in the sky approximately southwest of the above location. there is an airport nearby but, i've lived here my entire 43 years and am very aware of airplanes coming and going. my mother was also with me when we witnessed this at 3:43 am on october 25, 2016. i looked at my phone as i was talking to my mother and we were looking at orion and triangulum, with we do every night being on the graveyard shift. an airplane had just come by ready to land at the nearby airport and this light just appeared and was moving in the same direction, east, as the airport. the difference was that this thing was much higher and moving at lest twice as fast as the airplane that just came through. there were no signaling lights on it like an airplane and it left a gold trail behind it. i truly have no idea wtf we saw but it wasn't like any airplane we've seen in our 40 years here.
content.summary: Being next to an airport i am very aware of incoming and outgoing airplanes but this "thing" just appeared in the sky too high to be landing at the nearby airport and  too low to land in detroit that's approximately 120 miles away.

content.detailedDescription:
Three craft during 3 minutes


on monday september 26, 2016 at 3:15 pm, i decided to take some random videos over the treetops behind the house which overlooks blue springs lake.  this is because i had once again been noticing fleeting and very momentary fractions of a second of movements up, down, right and left.  if one pays attention, this occurs daily.

i took six random videos over a span of five minutes with each one varying in length.  in three of the videos i found evidence of craft moving through the screen. 
•	the first video was taken at 3:15 pm and lasted 17 seconds, and showed a black sphere moving from right to left in the lower quadrant of the screen above the tree tops.
•	the second video was taken at 3:17 pm and lasted 22 seconds and showed a faint grey sphere moving upward on the left side of the screen.
•	the third video was taken at 3:18 pm and lasted 12 seconds and showed a faint grey sphere moving from left to right at a slight angle in the upper quadrant of the screen.

video #1
the craft in this video was the clearest of the three and very obvious as a black round spherical craft.  it moved slowly compared to the other two craft as it lasted 3.56 seconds as it moved from the right to the left side of the screen from an elevation of 20° above the lake from 340° to 333°..  the distance travelled, assuming that it was around 1 mile away, calculates to a distance of .15 miles in 3.56 seconds.  the speed computes to be 151 mph. it dropped 3.5° from right to left in its trajectory across the screen.  interestingly, the distance that it travelled from first observation to probably hitting of land or water is about .86 miles.  it just so happens that there is a small unnamed lake due west of the initial sighting that is .87 miles away.  this most likely was its destination.
                                
video #2
the craft in video # 2 was a light grey sphere that moved upward at nnw or 334° and travelled a distance of .1 mile in .73 seconds.  this converts to 493 mph.
                            
video #3
the craft in video # 3 is at an 18° elevation above the lake travelled from left to right on the screen a distance of .19 miles in .37 seconds.  this converts to 1,868 mph.

discussion:
in a span of only 3 minutes, three different types of craft were captured on video each travelling in a different heading and at different speeds.  this was due to my curiosity. i suspect however that if videos had been taken for several hours, much more would have been revealed.

from speeds of 151 mph to over 1868 mph, the three craft obviously had their own agendas.  the craft in videos #2 and #3 were similar in size and type-- being light and somewhat hazy grey spheres.  it is very difficult to obtain any clarity beyond what is in the photomerged frames above.  the black round craft from the first video however was able to be fairly accurately resolved into its shape as a sphere with clear lines.  

the craft appear to be unknown aerial vehicles, demonstrating speeds (493 mph and 1868 mph) which defy those of known human-made small aircraft.  for example the top speed for a piper cub is 87 mph, while the top speed for a cessna 182 is 173 mph. this analogy is despite the fact that none of the craft in these videos even remotely resemble human-made small aircraft.  

the probable target of descent of the black spherical first craft being only .86 miles distant makes the speed of 151 mph illogical if it were a normal and known aircraft such as a piper cub or cessna 182.  (a cessna averages 72 mph at landing, and a piper at about 60 mph).  

all three craft either appear to be headed to entering a lake, or have departed from a lake.  the first craft appears to be descending straight toward the unnamed lake behind the lakewood oaks golf clubhouse.  the second craft appears to be departing from 334° azimuth, or the westernmost portion of blue springs lake.  the third craft appears to be ascending to the right from the unnamed lake behind the golf clubhouse.  

origins & destinations:
•	the origin of the black sphere in the 1st video is unknown.  its destination appears to be the small unnamed lake west of highway 291, at 310° azimuth from point of observation.
•	the origin of the ascending grey sphere from the 2nd video appears to come from the westernmost area of blue springs lake at 334° azimuth from point of observation.
•	the origin of the grey sphere from the 3rd video, since it has an angle of climb not unlike that of the angle of descent of the black sphere from the 1st video—could be from the same small unnamed lake.  the angle of descent of the first craft was 3.5° while the angle of ascent of the third craft averages to about 4°, close enough for a margin of error.

summary:
1.	three craft were seen in a span of 3 minutes.
2.	two of the craft may have been coming from and going to the same location.
3.	the speed of descent of the black sphere entering the unnamed lake was much slower at 151 mph, but the craft that seemed to be departing from the same area was very fast at 1868 mph.  this would be logical to conclude about such movements.
4.	as of this report, five bodies of water within a 5 square mile triangle have been reported to be the origins and destinations of many craft.  

these lakes include:
•	 blue springs lake. 
•	lakewood lakes. 
•	the unnamed lake in this report (just west of  highway 291 and behind the lakewood oaks golf clubhouse)
•	the unnamed lake .3 miles west of blue springs lake’s middle and western shore.
•	the unnamed lake at the bass pro shops mall west of the intersection of highway 291 and 40 highway.

conclusion:

the fact that the speeds of other two of the craft were 493 mph and 1868 mph are proof that none of them are normal human-made craft.  the shapes of these three craft being spherical are also not shapes of human aircraft.  the origins and destinations of the craft appear to be lakes, and not airfields.  therefore it is reasonable to conclude that none of the three craft in these videos are of human origin.
content.summary: Three craft were seen during a span of three minutes with different trajectories

content.detailedDescription:
(360) 773-5107
i was woken up with pain in my lower back. my insides hurt. i opened my eyes and looked up from my bed at the sky light up above me. it was very quiet in the house.  i head no sounds at all. it was like nothing. i didn't even hear the normal house sounds. like  refrigerator and heater.  and i also did not hear my grandparents snoring. silence. as i saw this  jellyfish like highly technological thing. with a dull pale color. like dull metal. with  tentacle light cords hanging down with some clamps on them or tools at the end of them.  it was a sending up toward the vaulted ceiling toward the skylight . i than heard a voice  telepathically . it was upset i woke up. i was not suppose to see it. than it.  disappeared and i was forced to close my eyes. but on becoming fully awake i remember details of the object. i'm going to draw a picture of it today. i believe it was doing something to my body from behind. it worked through my back and insides. what they took or did i do not know.  but my back hurts and it made my period become very heavy.
content.features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Other
content.summary: highly advanced technological jellyfish shape.  tentacles dropping down like electrical cords. some kind of claps on ends.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 13 maybe 14 !Y mother brother,brothers friend,& i were traveling north on !Manhattan ave around 5pm to go to the farm store drive thru.As we were heading north passed fairoaks we noticed there was a huge blimp up ahead in our straight path as we got closer we started to see it had circular windows the color and how it was hovering over the bank on henderson blvd.At this time we are all yelling it's ah ufo!!!! i remember my ma yanking the steering wheel to the left to pull into the farm store drive thru.When my step dad opens the door for us when we got home he was so angry with my ma claiming we've been gone for 2hours(there & back only takes 15mins tops) we pleaded with him he was crazy we only went to the drive thru.A couple of months later my brothers friend came over again & he brought up the ufo we seen. we all 3 sat there with our eyeballs ready to pop out!!! we lost 2hours of time,dont remember driving home,didnt remember even seeing the gosh darn ufo til months later.We sure would of had our eyes peeled open looking for the ufo on the way back home.We don't remember driving back home..Just my step dad really worried+mad.We all talk about it from time to time except we lost contact with my brothers friend over the years.I told my ma if i had the chance to get us hypnotized i'd do it just to hear/remember what happened during those 2hours of our life's weve lost.
content.summary: My mother, brother, a friend& i seen a big ufo as we were driving north on manhattan ave and 5pm. when we got home !Y step dad was yelling saying we were gone 2hrs.Its a 15min tops aron.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home. and looked up and seen this floating purple light. it didnt move from where it was at. it just floated. i didnt know if it was something for halloween or what. as i turned tje curve i could see it better. the light just floated above the trees. i dont know what it would of been. not saying it was a ufo. i would just like to know what it could of been.
content.summary: It was a purple wavy floating light. it just floated there thats all it done

content.detailedDescription: 5177490344 the glowing sphere-like object appeared out of nowhere in the sky approximately southwest of the above location. there is an airport nearby but, i've lived here my entire 43 years and am very aware of airplanes coming and going. my mother was also with me when we witnessed this at 3:43 am on october 25, 2016. i looked at my phone as i was talking to my mother and we were looking at orion and triangulum, with we do every night being on the graveyard shift. an airplane had just come by ready to land at the nearby airport and this light just appeared and was moving in the same direction, east, as the airport. the difference was that this thing was much higher and moving at lest twice as fast as the airplane that just came through. there were no signaling lights on it like an airplane and it left a gold trail behind it. i truly have no idea wtf we saw but it wasn't like any airplane we've seen in our 40 years here.
content.summary: Being next to an airport i am very aware of incoming and outgoing airplanes but this "thing" just appeared in the sky too high to be landing at the nearby airport and  too low to land in detroit that's approximately 120 miles away.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter, her husband and i were in the backyard, when her husband started shouting and pointing up and yelling that there was a ufo in the sky! we all couldn't believe our eyes.  the craft appeared to be very large and was moving slowly and silently across the night sky.  it was approximately 9:20 when we saw red blinking lights as we looked west, over the riverburch shopping center. the craft was lower than a commercial plane would have been flying and was about the length of a football field. the width was very narrow, giving it a cylinder shape or missile shape.  i couldn't understand how it could be so long and so narrow, because it seemed like this design would not be strong enough to support its mass or occupants that could have been within.  we all had goose bumps.  could it be a blimp, a drone, or a space station?  we ruled out the later because i had observed the space station earlier last month and its path and size was entirely different. there was a large blinking red light at the front of the craft and one at the rear.  the lights blinked in unison.  to the left of the craft there was a red light which was also blinking, and after about 5 blinks it would turn green and then it would go back to blinking red. this light did not appear to be attached.  could it have been a much smaller craft,guarding the larger one? there was another light exactly like this to the right of the craft.   
there was absolute silence. we lost sight as it went behind a tree,so we moved to the side yard facing east. then it moved behind another tree,so we moved to the front yard, just as the craft moved to far away to be seen any longer.  from start to finish, the entire observation lasted about 6 or 7 minutes. the craft moved off in the direction of lillington,nc.  we tried to take pictures with a smart phone,but we couldn't see the lights or anything.  the screen just appeared black.  so now all we have is this eyewitness account. we would love for someone to say they saw it too and could tell us what this was.
content.summary: Hopping center moving toward downtown sanford.  it appeared to be cylinder shaped or missile shaped.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house when i heard a helicopter outside. we don't often get helicopters in this area, so i dicided to take a look. it was dark out but, due to the cloud coverage, i was able to see two dark cigar shaped objects without lights, being followed by the helicopter that i had heard.We live fairly close to dugway proving grounds aka the new roswell, but i have never seen anything like this before. the objects travelled in a southwest direction. i followed them until they passed out of veiw over the houses to the south.
content.summary: Miltary helicopter with lights folling 2 cigar shaped objects without lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out on deck with wife and looked to the north to see a tight v dimly lit with dim round lights on the bottom. the craft rotated to the north east and then i lost sight of the object. what ever it was moved silently and traveled over a mile in seconds.
both of us were in awe of what we saw and then made a note of the time. truly amazing ! exciting !
content.summary: A tight v shape lightly lit surface with dim lights. classic v shape. no sound and traveled over a mile in 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just finish recording my girlfriend and somw of her friend doing a sketch, i was walking back home and looked up. then i a plane(comercial) and right infront of the plane little white spheres. at first i thought they were balloons or something like that, but the way they were moving just wasn't right. they moved loke with the air flow but they also made suddle stops, drops and elevatios that made me realize that it might be an ufo. so i took out my smartphone and shot the video i send you. i was carrying equipment at the time and had to stop and do it again.
i say some bad language  in the video sorry i was exited.
after the second video i wanted to call someone to see if they could see it too,  but as i took my eyes away they vanished.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was confusing because at first i though it were only balloons, but their movement is wasn't right

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger traveling south of riverside on highway 218 before sunrise. what caught my eye was what i thought was a plane traveling low from west to east. it had a consistent white pulsating light that went from dim to bright. it then appeared to turn north and follow the road. as we got closer we could see it was right over the shoulder of the oncoming lane and was not moving. fortunately the truck had a sunroof and i was able to look up at it. the center had a round white pulsating light and square lights that remained dim on what appeared to be the ends of the object. i could not see the square lights until we went underneath it. the sky was dark and i could not see an outline for a definite shape but the lights made it appear rectangular. just the outline of the lights were quite large. after the shock of what i saw i looked back and the object had not moved. what stays with me is the size and how low it was.
content.summary: I observed what i thought was a plane traveling low from west to east.  it appeared to turn north but when our truck got to it it was not moving. center round white pulsating light with square lights on what appeared to be the ends of the object.

content.detailedDescription: I had just picked up my son from his friend's house and we were driving home. i noticed an odd looking, grey object flying in the sky just above the level of some trees at the end of the street. i noticed it because it was in my field of vision and it didn't look like a plane or a bird. there were no lights that i could see. i had no idea what it could be. i asked my 15 yo son if he saw it, he said yes. i kept saying "what is that",and "what the hell is that"? he said i don't know. i told him i was glad he was with me because if he had not been, i'm sure he would think i was seeing things as if i were "crazy". the object moved from my left to right the banked, turned right and was going down in altitude. it disappeared behind the trees and i lost sight of it. i was excited about seeing it and grateful that i had a witness, my son. we talked about it on the drive home. once we got home, my son and one of his friend's were talking on the phone and the friend asked my son if he had seen anything in the sky as we were leaving. my son told him yes and then came and told me that 3 of his friend's had seen it too and one of them took a video of it. very exciting. the friend sent the video to my son. i saw it and could barely make out the object. he then sent it to me via facebook messenger but as i watched it, i couldn't tell anything about the object on my computer. ( i don't know how to get the video from my message to my computer to be able to attach it. i do have the message.)i could see the road, the sky and my car driving away in the video. the next day i asked the friends if they had heard any sound, they said no. they also reported not seeing any lights. they described it to me as flying extremely fast. i only saw it for about 5-8 seconds.
content.summary: I was driving and saw a cylinder shaped object flying in the sky. it was a shady shady, grey color with no lights. it made a right turn then disappeared behind some trees. couldn't hear any sound.

content.detailedDescription:
1. having coffee on patio
2. brightness and position
3. unknown
4. it began as a large bright star, it descended about 20 degrees over a 10-15 minute period, i went to get my binoculars and it had seemed to have gotten a little closer and dropped another 5 degrees. as i observed it through my binoculars (i steadied my elbows on a table to reduce dancing effect), the object , which was shaped like an oval pill, seem to have either changed shape or discharged what was seemingly a larger object.
the new object was circular and had no distinct lights as an aircraft might have. inside the circle was covered by a strange pattern. the color was greenish-yellow with black lines forming the pattern.
5. i was simply stupified and could even venture a guess at what i was looking at. i just enjoyed the experience and the wonder of it.
6. i lost sight as it either got lower in the sky or traveled away from my position. i lost sight in the trees on a ridge about 1/4 mile from me.

this is the second night i saw this object...The first night 2 days ago
it was already near the top of the ridge and i only viewed it for about 5 minutes. my wife saw it both times as well.

i can send a sketch if you'd like.
content.summary: Please read below

content.detailedDescription: I work at target in mt kisco. i went outside for a few minutes while on break, and there was an odd young man standing outside. at first he started to talk to me, but then i almost assumed he was on drugs because of what he was saying. he was talking about disclosure, and then he asked me if i wanted to see something. he reached into his pocket and pulled out a flash light and shined it in the sky. all of a sudden an orb appeared. he did it again and a second orb appeared. and then a third time and a third orb appeared. they made a triangle formation and disappeared shortly thereafter. i asked him what it was and he said "i'm not going to lie, those things you are witnessing are extraterrestrial. he said "they only allowed me to show them to you because you are a stranger". then he went on telling me that they are here, and talked about a citizen disclosure project that will imminently make their existence known to everyone. i was in no way prepared to be amazed by this guy, but it left me wondering what it was he was showing me, and who he was. i am writing this minutes after witnessing, and if he is still there when i get out of work, i plan on trying to get it on video. there is a lot of light pollution in this area so hopefully i can get something on film. in any event i figured it was definitely strange enough that i felt the need to make a report. i don't follow ufos and conspiracy theories closely, but i am thinking whatever i witnessed made me believe.
content.summary: 3 lights appeared out of thin air

content.detailedDescription: As the weather has begun to become enjoyable i decided to take my lunch break outside, as i often do. my partner was on his way so i was just finishing up when i looked above the two buildings i was sitting behind, the business next door and the building i work at. reveling in the delicious meal i had just devoured i threw my head back and noticed it. i thought that airplane looks strange. i stared a bit longer to notice it had no wings. i immediately stood up and took notice. from my vantage point it was traveling along the building top and was about to disappear. i could also see another plane way further in the distance that like normal had vapor trail behind it and the thing i was looking at didnt. the more i looked at it the more i could tell it just didnt fit. it also seemed hazy or even blurry and though there wasnt any kind of wing there was the sun glinting along the entire body of the craft. on this particular day i did not have my smart phone and as i held up my burner phone to work out a way to get a photograph, the object without a sound blasted into the sky. it was so quick, it was as if it were never there at all. just a blink and it was gone.
content.summary: A cylindrical tube, hazy and fast moving

content.detailedDescription: Took 3 photos of object with gps on
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Took 3 photos of object

content.detailedDescription:
I turned video cam on moving try pod then craft went bye real fast video pick up sound.The original video cigar shape craft up close taken on 9-30-16 in turner,maine. craft comes in to view at around the 42sec min mark. it goes bye so fast there is only 5 frames.If i am not mistaken this craft made a sound.Some excellent analysis of the cigar shape craft.
there are 5 frames that appear, and sound is heard suggesting close proximity.
the anomaly is blurred, in each frame because its overall velocity is greater than the shutter speed used in the capture.
(its moving faster than the shutter speed used) there are no mechanical sounds,
just the sound of an object passing through the air within vicinity of the microphone.
its impossible to gauge the proximity of this object (near or far). its not at cloud level because they're not disrupted. jose escamilla,
taken general turner center hill rd turner,maine on 9.30.201
content.summary: I turned video cam on moving try pod then craft went bye real fast video pick up sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south(west) on i-440 about 1 mile before the i40 interchange and 1 mile south of 67/167. there is marshland. the sun was coming up in the east on my left. i looked west to say something to my son who was sitting in the passenger seat. i saw something large reflecting the sun. i drive this way every morning to work. i have never seen anything looming over the marshland. it seemed about 1-2 miles away but im not sure. it was reflecting the morning sun. it looked like a giant square perpendicular to the ground. not another aircraft. it just looked like a huge mirror or piece of copper or foil reflecting the sun sticking up out above the trees or the marshy area. i was driving about 70 miles an hour and passed it before i could determine what it really was.
content.summary: Ufo seemed like a giant reflective piece of foil reflecting the eastern sun

content.detailedDescription:
Good evening,

i write you because yesterday, i witnessed a strange phenomenon. it was arround 2:00am and we are 4 people to have seen that. i was with a friend and her parents. we saw 2 bright balls which followed each other, quickly moved forward before disappearing in the sky. then 8-10 seconds after an other one appeared, according to the same way. then 15 seconds later an other one arrived, it was different. he looked like a transparent bubble. the night was clear, there were no clouds. 4 ufo followed the same trajectory and disappeared in the sky. they were fast and there was no noise of engine. or was very strange and it doesn't look like a planes or others. please find the attached pictures. sorry for the bad quality. hope you can do something with that...

kind regards
content.summary: Amazing and fast

content.detailedDescription: Walking to my parents house next door when i noticed it. seen the same light multiple times from same location in different spots in sky over period of this last month. will remain stationary then zig zag erratically over a small portion of the sky. had my phone so i recorded it. starting to get worrisome with seeing it multiple times. watched it for twenty minutes but had to leave to finish my walk. when i came back it was gone
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed multiple times over a month

content.detailedDescription: I have filmed orbs since august 2008 through 2009 near tucson arizona. 25,000 pictures and over 100 hours of video have been recorded. i posted the video tucson orbs on you tube, please search on that for a 67 minute video documenting my experiences. many orbs are flying and landing near-by my property and following my camera.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Goto you tube and search on tucson orbs for 67 minute video of encounter

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from san jose, ca to san mateo, ca on wednesday, october 19, 2016 taking highway 280 north.  as i was hitting the woodside area, i observed a sun that was starting to dip behind the mountains and clouds that were glowing from the suns reflection.

then i noticed what could only be described as another light source.  at first, i thought about planet x, and because i was driving and trying to not crash, i came to the conclusion that this was either reflecting light or a light source.  it was much brighter and concentrated that the typical glow of clouds that one may see as the sun rises or sets.

it was very bright and much smaller than the sun.  the object didn't appear to move and because i was in the car, i was not able to observe any motion and/or sounds.  i was witness to this event for approximately two minutes. 

i took three pictures through the windshield.  two of the photos do show blue orbs, but those were not visible when i took the photo so they very well could be, and probably are, reflections from the windshield.

the object is located to the right of the sun and in the center of the photo and just above the mountain range line.  these photos are unedited and taken with an iphone 5s.

i thought about getting off the freeway, but as i got closer to the mountains, the mountains began to block my view and perspective of this reflective light or light source event.
content.summary: Light observed as sun was setting that was reflective and/or a definite light source, not a cloud reflection the sun

content.detailedDescription: Our house is in an area of massachusetts close to what is known as the bridgwater triangle. my kids mother and i are very dedicated to our research of ufos and e.T. life. approximately twice a week, outside our house, we can see on the horizon about a mile away, a glowing ball of light, it appears as a star at first. it hovers then begins traveling in a linear path. it will stop and it will become extremely bright before changing direction and traveling very fast in another direction. after doing this for several minutes it will fade away. as i stated earlier, this happens in the same area (over a power plant in a neighboring town), several times a week.  it is not an aircraft or any type of drone that i know of.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb appeared dim and brightness grew quickly then it traveled very fast and changed direction several times then phased out (recurring event)

content.detailedDescription: We were having dinner on the balcony it was my mothers birthday . there were no clouds at all pretty nice evening to hang outside.. suddenly the red light caught my attention because it was moving at an unbelievable speed back and fourth .. this was in my opinion nothing like human made because the speed it was going and and at the same time it was changing directions . i was to late to get my cellphone in my room so i was only able to film it hovering for quit some time .. this video was only seen in my family cause i was not sure what to do with it and who to tell about it.. the object was like a round shape and was having red /yellow flames at the back and below.. i was shocked and couldnt believe what we witnessed.. we lost sight of it as it was dissapearing far away..
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was changing directons so fast you couldnt follow it properly , meanwhile it hovered for a short time aswell
